mapper.sql: id, create_at, organi_name, tray_num, product_num, remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from storage_organi_count
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT ( CASE WHEN (entryTime < outTime AND entryTime < orgTime) THEN entryTime WHEN (outTime < entryTime AND outTime < orgTime) THEN outTime ELSE orgTime END ) AS startTime FROM ( SELECT entryTime ,outTime ,orgTime FROM (SELECT create_at AS entryTime FROM order_entry_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") ASC LIMIT 1) AS t1, (SELECT create_at AS outTime FROM order_outbound_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") ASC LIMIT 1) AS t2, (SELECT create_at AS orgTime FROM storage_organi_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS t3 ) AS t4

SELECT ( CASE WHEN (entryTime > outTime AND entryTime > orgTime) THEN entryTime WHEN (outTime>entryTime AND outTime > orgTime) THEN outTime ELSE orgTime END ) AS startTime FROM ( SELECT entryTime ,outTime ,orgTime FROM (SELECT create_at AS entryTime FROM order_entry_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") DESC LIMIT 1) AS t1, (SELECT create_at AS outTime FROM order_outbound_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") DESC LIMIT 1) AS t2, (SELECT create_at AS orgTime FROM storage_organi_count ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(create_at,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i%S") DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS t3 ) AS t4

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(storage_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS entryDate , IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(entry_count, 0)),0) AS entryCount, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(amounts, 0)),0) AS entryAmount from order_entry_count where storage_date between DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") group by storage_date having storage_date is not null

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(outbound_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS outDate , IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(pack_count, 0)),0) AS outCount from order_outbound_count where outbound_date between DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") group by outbound_date having outbound_date is not null

SELECT organi_name AS orgName, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(tray_num, 0)),0) AS trayCount, IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(product_num, 0)),0) AS proCount FROM storage_organi_count WHERE 1=1
and create_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") and DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s")
GROUP BY organi_name HAVING organi_name IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert:
insert into storage_organi_count
id,
create_at,
organi_name,
tray_num,
product_num,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{organiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{trayNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update storage_organi_count
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_at = #{record.createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organi_name = #{record.organiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tray_num = #{record.trayNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_num = #{record.productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update storage_organi_count set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_at = #{record.createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organi_name = #{record.organiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tray_num = #{record.trayNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_num = #{record.productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update storage_organi_count
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organi_name = #{organiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tray_num = #{trayNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update storage_organi_count set create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organi_name = #{organiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tray_num = #{trayNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_num = #{productNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
